title: Regarding my issue in solo queue.
body:
For the past 3000+ games I have had 90%+ of my teammates seriously outmatched in every way in comparison to the enemy team.

I know how much of a team game this is and how much of an impact teammates can make in a game both to help you and detriment you.

If I could please have someone add me or reply to this post regarding my issue, this would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks.

replies.body:
For the past 3000 games I've had 90% of my team mates carry me to victory.

Rito this mmr system is gr8 keep up the good work

This season is weird. I am 100 percent sure if we don't have luck then we can't climb lol.

I was stuck in bronze 3 last season, after I get to bronze 1 every time I get the problem where 90 percent of my mates are outmatched and I drop to season 4.  Then I climbed again and this a repetive cycle as I always lost the promos.

This season though Lady Luck smiled on me, most of my team mates are last season Gold and I get carried every game hard this season and now Silver 5. But Since the firewall bug with the last patch I got frucked and someone kidnapped my Lady Luck, I think it must be Rito and their disgusting fiddly and restless hands that killed the servers.

>I think it must be Rito and their disgusting fiddly and restless hands that killed the servers.

That's the most logical thing I've seen you write.

> [{quoted}](name=HORSE OF FORCE,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=heojJEZU,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-02-08T09:27:04.413+0000)
>
> That's the most logical thing I've seen you write.

Ya I know, I was half brain dead when I made that reply because I never had enough sleep lol. I was typing with half closed eyes haha. Sorry for that. :)
